website_summaries.verdict: The Linksys E8400 AC2400 Dual-Band Wireless Router delivers fast close-range throughput on both bands and is a breeze to install, but it doesn't support MU-MIMO streaming, and it uses an old Linksys management console.
cons: Lacks Multi-User Multiple Input, Multiple Output (MU-MIMO) support

customer_reviews.title: If you need a terrible router, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.text: If you love having your wifi disconnect constantly and need a 5g signal that is basically useless due to connection loss, this is the router for you! If you are looking for solid wifi that connects when you expect, and stays connected to the internet, you should really get a different router, as this one is not for you. I often wonder as I reboot this router in the hope it will actually work, if it was made as some kind of cruel joke router instead of an actual functional router.
customer_reviews.author: The Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: With some settings tweeks it's working much better. Downloading the new firmware (which I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I had a lot of trouble with this router. Same as everyone else here, dropping signal, buffering/lag, ect. With some settings tweeks it's working much better. Downloading the new firmware (which I had to do twice for it to take) and changing the WiFi channels on both the 2.4ghz & 5.0ghz helped greatly. For a smaller home network this router is still simply, just fine. I am going to keep it but I probably wouldn't recommend it to my friends.
